content: अभ्यनुज्ञा {c9c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To permit, assent or agree to, approve; अतोऽ भ्यनुजानातु भवती <ls>K. 209</ls>; <ls>M. 3</ls>; <ls>Ms. 2. 1.</ls> {@--2@} To permit one to go, grant leave to, dismiss. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} To ask for leave to depart, take leave.

अभ्यनुज्ञा, --ज्ञानं {@--1@} Consent, approval, permission; कृताभ्यनुज्ञा गुरुणा गरीयसा <ls>Ku. 5. 7</ls>, <ls>R. 2. 69.</ls> {@--2@} Order, command. {@--3@} Granting leave of absence, dismissing. {@--4@} Admission of an argument.
